history.proof: intros a p Hcan. inversion Hcan; subst. qsimpl. qsimpl use: canonical_imp_in_nzero. qsimpl use: canonical_imp_in_nzero. qsimpl use: canonical_imp_in_nzero. qsimpl use: canonical_imp_in_nzero. qsimpl use: canonical_imp_in_nzero. qauto use: mainu1, nillu2, olist_pX_order, nillu1 unfold: pO, pX inv: list.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) Hcan : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1772 ?M1774) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1773 ?M1775) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1773 ?M1776)" with "plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H1 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p H2 : zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> False M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) A1_diff_A0 : eqA A1 A0 -> False eqA_ref : reflexive A eqA eqA_sym : symmetric A eqA eqA_trans : transitive A eqA plusA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c) plusA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a) plusA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b)) multA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c d) multA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c)) (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp : forall (a b c d : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZd : eqA d A0 -> False), eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c d nZd) divA_multA_comp_r : forall (a b c : A) (nZc : eqA c A0 -> False), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) Unable to unify "plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M4683 ?M4685) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M4684 ?M4686) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M4684 ?M4687)" with "plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)".

exceptions.tactic: apply canonical_imp_in_nzero in Hcan; try auto.

exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> forall a : Term A n, In a p -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> False A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H1 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p H2 : zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> False M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) A1_diff_A0 : eqA A1 A0 -> False eqA_ref : reflexive A eqA eqA_sym : symmetric A eqA eqA_trans : transitive A eqA plusA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c) plusA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a) plusA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b)) multA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c d) multA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c)) (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp : forall (a b c d : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZd : eqA d A0 -> False), eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c d nZd) divA_multA_comp_r : forall (a b c : A) (nZc : eqA c A0 -> False), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) Unable to unify "plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M8911 ?M8913) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M8912 ?M8914) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M8912 ?M8915)" with "plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)".

original: intros a p Hcan. inversion Hcan; subst. - constructor. - constructor. + auto. + apply canonical_imp_in_nzero in Hcan; try auto. intros Hcontra. inversion Hcontra. - constructor. + auto. + apply canonical_imp_in_nzero in Hcan; try auto. intros Hcontra. inversion Hcontra.
